description: Triangle of coefficients in a Fibonacci-like sequence of polynomials.
comments: Essentially the same as A108299. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 27 2014
references: A. F. Horadam, R. P. Loh and A. G. Shannon, Divisibility properties of some Fibonacci-type sequences, pp. 55-64 of Combinatorial Mathematics VI (Armidale 1978), Lect. Notes Math. 748, 1979.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
